籤詩版本二:
Sezvakangoita kukweva ingwe mugomo refu, kurwa uye kukwikwidzana kuputsa chando
Kana ukaerekana waita chinhu chakanaka usingazive unofanira kuzvichengeta.Izwi rokuti kukweva ingwe rinoreva kugumbatira dindingwe.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi yakafanana nekubata (kukweva) dindi kuyambuka gomo.
Zvose zvine ngozi uye zvinotyisa.
解曰: Ngozi ine ngozi. Pane zvipingamupinyi zviri mberi. Kana ukakumbira mazano. Ibasa rakaoma chaizvo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Wu Yuan akasiya Zhaoguan husiku (Wu Zixu akapfuura Zhaoguan)
Wu Zixu aive chizvarwa cheChu muChirimo neMatsutso Period. Panguva iyoyo, Mambo Ping weChu aida kumuvhima. Mambo Ping weChu akapa mubairo wekusungwa kwaWu Zixu, uye akaita kuti mufananidzo wake udhirowe ndokuiswa pamagedhi eguta mhiri kweChu State, uye akaraira vakuru vakuru kuti vawedzere kuferefeta. Wu Zixu paakatizira kuZhaoguan, muganho weWu neChu, vakuru vepaZhaoguan vakanyatsoongorora.Akanga achinetsekana zvekuti akatadza kurara kwehusiku hwakati wandei hwakatevedzana, uye kunyangwe bvudzi rake rakatanga kuchena nekushushikana. Sezvineiwo, ndakasangana nemurume anonzi Dong Gao Gong, uyo akanzwira tsitsi dambudziko rake ndokuenda naye kumba kuti ahwande. Duke Dong Gao aive neshamwari yaiita seWu Zixu, saka Duke Dong Gao akamukumbira kuti apase bvunzo nekunyepedzera kuve Wu Zixu. Varindi vakabata Wu Zixu wenhema, asi Wu Zixu chaiye aisakwanisa kuzivikanwa nevakuru nekuti bvudzi rake rakanga rakachena rose, saka vakamurega achipfuura. Gare gare, akapukunyuka zvakakotsekana kudunhu reWu.
(Kutsiva Wu Zixu neshamwari inoita seyakafanana, uye iye pachake ane bvudzi jena, ndirwo "ruoko rwemashiripiti" rwenyaya iyi)
聖意: Namatira imba yako neimba yako kuti zvizvidzivirire, chenjerera kutsvaga pfuma, ngwarira pakutengeserana, kumira mukutengeserana, matambudziko muwanano.
古人: Wu Yuan akasiya Zhaoguan husiku (Wu Zixu akapfuura Zhaoguan)
